title: These Ukrainians Don’t Want to Be Traded to Russia for Peace
summary_full: Four years into the war, a major sticking point in talks is control of the eastern Donetsk region. Residents could face an agonizing choice if Ukraine gives up the territory.
summary_public: Four years into the war, a major sticking point in talks is control of the eastern Donetsk region. Residents could face an agonizing choice if Ukraine gives up the territory.

RU.label: negative
